text: Berdahl is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Blaze Berdahl (born 1980), American actress, singer, rapper, voice-over actor, announcer and narrator *Daphne Berdahl (1964–2007), German-born American anthropologist *Jennifer Berdahl, American sociologist *Robert M. Berdahl (born 1937), American college and university administrator
title: Berdahl
